short_intro: Brainware Vidyalankar Scholarship is a prestigious merit-based scholarship awarded to academically outstanding students based on their performance in the qualifying examination. It provides partial or full tuition fee waivers to recognize excellence and encourage high-achieving students.
detailed_description: The Brainware Academic Excellence Scholarship (Vidyalankar) is designed to reward students who demonstrate exceptional academic merit in their qualifying examinations (such as Class 12 or equivalent).This scholarship directly reduces the tuition fee burden and acts as a recognition of scholastic achievement at the time of admission.

academic_requirement: Marks obtained in the qualifying examination determine eligibility
student_category: Applicable only for Indian domestic students

waiver_structure_table.table_description: Scholarship benefits based on qualifying examination marks

special_award_for_toppers.title: Institutional Topper Benefit
special_award_for_toppers.description: Institutional toppers scoring less than 90% in the qualifying examination are eligible for an additional monetary benefit.
special_award_for_toppers.important_note: This benefit is provided over and above the regular merit scholarship, if applicable.

not_applicable_for.reason: Scholarship is restricted to domestic Indian students only
Students already associated with Brainware University are not eligible

rules_list: Scholarship is awarded strictly based on marks obtained in the qualifying examination
Only one Brainware University scholarship can be availed by a candidate at a time
Full or Half Freeship holders are not eligible for Early Bird Offer
Scholarship benefits are subject to verification of academic documents

summary_highlights: Based only on qualifying exam marks
Not applicable for International & Alumni students
